title: SMC_GSentence_DynCall (Struct)
text:
TYPE SMC_GSentence_DynCall : STRUCT
A dynamic subprogram call using an expression for the subprogram name

rows.Name: types
rows.Comment:
The type information about all arguments
to DYNCALL.  The first argument is the subprogram name.

rows.Name: nArgs
rows.Comment:
The number of arguments (including the subprogram name), at
least 1.

rows.Name: symbolTable
rows.Comment:
The symbol table is passed to the interpreter as part
of the sentence data.
